review: My skin is peeling off my hands and Acetonide doesn't help. I'm going to cut back on using this drug.

The pills are just too big. I choke almost every time I take them. It they were coated with something to alleviate the chalk like outside consistency, it might help. I cut them in half using a pill cutter and that helps somewhat. But I have informed my husband to sue the company when trying to swallow one of these pills if it actually chokes me to death.

The pills too large to swallow and I almost choked twice.   So now I bite tablet in half.  I'm  afraid to swallow and my voice is getting hoarse.  I'm  thinking of stopping this med.  Is there a liquid form available?
Works great, I feel so much better, and no side effects at all!
Increased urination and loss of bladder control.
Got severe gastrointestinal pain/cramps and diarrhea after 2 doses.
